{"id":931191949,"question_id":2720,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1681119192,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"23 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/931191949/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimize the Maximum Difference of Pairs","memory":"56.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minimizeMax(int[] A, int p) {\n        Arrays.sort(A);\n        int n = A.length, left = 0, right = A[n - 1] - A[0];\n        while (left < right) {\n            int mid = (left + right) / 2, k = 0;\n            \n            for (int i = 1; i < n && k < p; ++i) {\n                if (A[i] - A[i - 1] <= mid) {\n                    k++; //如果之間的差<mid 就select this tuple , otherwise 考慮下一對:  A[i+1], A[i] 這個pair\n                    i++; // i++ 考慮下一對:  A[i+2], A[i+1] 這個pair\n                }\n            }\n            if (k >= p)\n                right = mid;\n            else\n                left = mid + 1;\n        }\n        return left;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimize-the-maximum-difference-of-pairs","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
